definition: To convey or transport something through a tube.
example: The water will tube through the pipes to reach the garden.

definition: To take hold of something suddenly or roughly.
example: He will grab the opportunity to learn new skills.

definition: To push oneself off the ground and into the air by using the muscles in one's legs and feet.
example: She can jump over the puddle without getting wet.

definition: To move at a speed faster than a walk.
example: He likes to run every morning to stay fit.

definition: To move through water by using the limbs.
example: They will swim in the lake during the summer.

definition: To mark letters, words, or other symbols on a surface.
example: She will write a letter to her friend.

definition: To look at and comprehend the meaning of written or printed matter.
example: He likes to read books before going to bed.

definition: To say something in order to convey information or express feelings.
example: She will speak at the conference next week.
They will listen to music while studying.

definition: To engage in activity for enjoyment and recreation.
example: The children will play outside after school.
